.class public auto ansi sealed EventArrivedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EventArrivedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As EventArrivedEventArgs)
public delegate void EventArrivedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, EventArrivedEventArgs ^ e);

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo a seguir assíncrono configura um timer WMI para disparar um evento a cada segundo e remove-lo quando forem mais necessários.The following asynchronous example sets up a WMI timer to raise an event every second, and removes it when no longer needed. O define vários [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] eventos que são gerados quando os eventos do WMI são entregues.The defines several [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] events which are raised when WMI events are delivered. Delegados são anexados a esses eventos para manipular os dados de entrada.Delegates are attached to these events for handling the incoming data.
